questions.question: What's 1 + 1?
questions.elaborateFeedback: If we start from the 1st number in the equation, in this case 1 and then count up n times where n equals the 2nd number in the equation, in this case it is also 1. So starting from 1 we count up 1 time so we go from 1->2 and 2 is our answer

questions.question: What's 44 % 10?
questions.elaborateFeedback: Divide the 1st number by the 2nd and the remainder is your answer

questions.question: What's 7 * 8?
questions.elaborateFeedback: Starting from 0, add the 1st number n times where n is the 2nd number. E.g. 7*8 = 7+7+7+7+7+7+7+7.
